attributes.action: To halt plans for compulsory voter photo ID.
attributes.additional_details: The Electoral Reform Society claimed that out of millions of votes cast in the UK last year, there were just eight allegations of personation fraud – the type of fraud that voter ID is meant to prevent.
attributes.background: This is a threat to democratic participation. Liberty has stated compulsory photo voter ID could undermine free and fair elections.  According to Electoral Commission figures, more than 700 people were denied a vote in trials in 10 council wards during May’s local elections due to a lack of photo ID
